CreateFavoriteQuery.name: CreateFavoriteQuery
CreateFavoriteQuery.description: Grants permission to create a new favorite query

CreateQueryHistory.name: CreateQueryHistory
CreateQueryHistory.description: Grants permission to add a query to the history

CreateTab.name: CreateTab
CreateTab.description: Grants permission to create a new query tab

DeleteFavoriteQueries.name: DeleteFavoriteQueries
DeleteFavoriteQueries.description: Grants permission to delete saved queries

DeleteQueryHistory.name: DeleteQueryHistory
DeleteQueryHistory.description: Grants permission to delete a historical query

DeleteTab.name: DeleteTab
DeleteTab.description: Grants permission to delete query tab

DescribeFavoriteQueries.name: DescribeFavoriteQueries
DescribeFavoriteQueries.description: Grants permission to list saved queries and associated metadata

DescribeQueryHistory.name: DescribeQueryHistory
DescribeQueryHistory.description: Grants permission to list history of queries that were run

DescribeTabs.name: DescribeTabs
DescribeTabs.description: Grants permission to list query tabs and associated metadata

GetQueryString.name: GetQueryString
GetQueryString.description: Grants permission to retrieve favorite or history query string by id

UpdateFavoriteQuery.name: UpdateFavoriteQuery
UpdateFavoriteQuery.description: Grants permission to update saved query and description

UpdateQueryHistory.name: UpdateQueryHistory
UpdateQueryHistory.description: Grants permission to update the query history

UpdateTab.name: UpdateTab
UpdateTab.description: Grants permission to update query tab
